article.title: Welcome to the Vermont U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the Vermont U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​​

The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized Vermont businesses realize their export potential. Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • Identify and evaluate international partners
  • Navigate international documentation challenges
  • Create market entry strategies
  • Other export related guidance

The U.S. Export Assistance Center located in Montpelier, Vermont is part of an international network of global professionals. We have 165 offices in 82 countries throughout the world. For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please clickhere!​
article.seometadatatitle: Welcome to the Vermont U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the Vermont U.S. Export Assistance Center.
